result.name: the-needles-marine-conservation-zone-mcz-survey-data
result.notes:
One survey of The Needles rMCZ site have been completed to date (Apr 2015):

Cruise: NDLS_2GDK0914

Date: 8th September - 16th September 2014

Data collected:

MB Bathymetry Coverage (Contractor): 100% Coverage (CHP)

MB Backscatter Coverage (Contractor): Limited quality CHP 50% coverage, 0% 
coverage for remaining 50%

SS Coverage: None acquired to date

Video and Stills Samples to date: ??? Video transects; 555 stills

PSA Samples to date: 28

Infauna Samples to date: 28
